title: Engineering Program Manager, Commerce, Apple Services Engineering
summary: The Apple Services Engineering team powers various Apple services such as the App Store, Apple Music, and Apple Books. They are looking for an Engineering Program Manager to enable subscriptions and offers for millions of customers globally.
description: In this role, you will manage Promotions and Messaging programs across Apple's services, leading high-value offers and customer touchpoint projects. You will work with cross-functional teams to deliver commerce features to customers on time and with quality.
preferred_qualifications: Adept at building relationships across teams, ability to present work to leadership teams, highly organized, autonomous problem solver, critical thinking skills, Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related field preferred.
pay_benefits: The base pay range for this role is between $157,000 and $278,900. Apple employees receive comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products and services, educational reimbursement, stock options, and more.
